channel.title: General store Help!
channel.description: In runescape general store items get deleted after a while and such, but in my server it stays until I refresh the server. How can I make it so that the general store sometimes deletes its items that players have sold to it?

item.title: General store Help!
item.dc:creator: @kthillman kthillman
item.description:
@kthillman wrote:

It goes in the “Shops.java” file

p.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, amount);

So if you wanted to make it a whole statement. You would have something like this:

			shop.add(item);
			p.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 12500000); //deletes 125m
			p.getInventory().addItem(1050, 1); //gives santa hat
			update();
		} else {
			ActionSender.sendMessage(p, "You do not have enough coins for this purchase.");
		}
	}

Read full topic
